Class Color

java.lang.Object
  aors.module.visopengl.test.utility.Color

public class Color
extends java.lang.Object

The Color class is representing a color inside of the RGBA color space.

Method Detail

setColorFromString

public void setColorFromString(java.lang.String color)
Initializes the color from a string. Either the color name, a RGB value coded as "rgb(255,255,255)" or a hex value coded as "#FFFFFF" can be provided.

Parameters:
color - String coded color value.
